content.description: Great location that's secluded from the wind, doesn't really get any sun to speak of. Trollville has great moderate to desperate ice routes, a high concentration of hard classic mixed climbs and a few rock climbs. A short approach would seemingly make it popular but the hard climbs and a HUGE 2002 rockfall that destroyed the classic testpiece Manchurian, have kept people away."Before there was ice, there was rock".   The rock climbing is described in the Trollville/Duckshead AREA under "Bartlett/Jackson"  R Hall NH Admin.
